title: Home - Amore Trattoria
text: An Immersive Italian Experience, Right Here in Grand Rapids Award-winning chef Jenna Arcidiacono brings a taste of the old world to Grand Rapids’ Alpine Avenue. Voted Best Chef, Best Service, Best Fine Dining, and Best Italian in Grand Rapids. (Photo: James Richard Fry) Welcome To Amore Take a West Michigan girl who’s been cooking professionally since before she could drive, add an exotic Italian husband and a mother-in-law from the old country with generations of family recipes stored in her memory. Season with several years spent living and cooking in Northern Italy. Then bring it all back to West Michigan at Alpine and 6 Mile, and you’ve got Amore Trattoria Italiana! Jenna ia known throughout West Michigan as an innovator and leader in the culinary space and beyond – watch the video to learn a little bit more about her! Vini e Liquori Casalinghi The taste of the old world doesn’t stop with our food menu! 100% Italian import wine list, plus homemade Italian liquers, and rare Italian cocktails from the mother land.
